body_content.explanation: small uncontrolled movements caused by someone being weak, ill, nervous, etc.:
examples: The shakiness in his hands means he needs extra time to get dressed.
Her voice was a little too loud - an attempt to cover her shakiness.

body_content.explanation: small movements from side to side because something is not being held firmly:
examples: I was worried by the shakiness of the bridge.

body_content.explanation: the fact of seeming weak or likely to fail:
examples: Government bonds gained popularity due to the shakiness of the US stock market.
Given the shakiness of its central claim, the book is an unsatisfying read.
